title: Riot OCE Ranked 5s!
body:
_Edit - done for the night now - thanks for tuning in!_

Hey dudes,

We're streaming Ranked 5s if you want to come watch!

http://www.twitch.tv/riotoce5s

replies.body:
Good Luck Riot!

P.S. no changing stats for your liking or removing fog of war and especially no undying rage permanently etc. :P

Mabye in normals I would have a laugh at that Riot trolling or 'strategically playing' but then others would just troll and say. "Riot did it so trolling is legal now".
Damn, I woulda tuned in or tried to snipe you guys.
Honestly I think rusty carried them. But it's a team game so no they all had equal parts in the game.
Want some cheese with your wine?
